title: Beef and Green Pepper Stir Fry
ingredients: ['450g beef steak, chopped into 1.5cm cubes', '1/2 teaspoon white pepper', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 small shallot, sliced', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 medium onion, diced', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 medium green pepper, diced', '2 tablespoons Chinese barbecue sauce', '1 dessertspoon oyster sauce']
